A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
/s

I loved the movie\, you guys are crazy.

The Finn/Rose romance storyline was fantastic and a breath of fresh air. Truly the Romeo and Juliet of this generation

Luke Skywalker was badass in this movie. The way he milked a sea cow and acted emo was awesome. I also like how he died by meditating

I like that Snoke ended up having no backstory or anything and went out like a bitch. Was good to see them hype up a character and shock the fans by throwing him away so easily

I like that Finn/Rose/Oscar devised this scheme to go to the casino city\, sneak on to the starship and ultimately do nothing besides getting caught (and killing their friends I might add)

I liked that they randomly killed beloved fan favorite Admiral Ackbar without any fanfare

I like that they focused so much on purple haired captain and her death. She was such a pivotal character

/s
